code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import authReducer from"../features/authSlice";import authorReducer from"../features/authorSlice";import blogReducer from"../features/blogSlice";import categoryReducer from"../features/categoriesSlice";export const store=configureStore({reducer:{auth:authReducer,author:authorReducer,blogs:blogReducer,categories:categoryReducer}});
